title: Button component
content_markdown:
Version: 8.2
On this page
Level: beginner
`Button` is a component that implements the **Button** type component in the front-end. Use the **Button** type component to implement user interaction with a Freedom UI page.
## Properties​
title: string  
Button name. Required to bind the button to a handler, access the model attributes, etc.
visible: boolean  
Button visibility.
color: ButtonColor  
Button color. By default, `default`.
Available values
default|  ![](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/documentation/sdk/en/BPMonlineWebSDK/Screenshots/Button/8.2/scr_default_color.png)  
---|---  
primary|  ![](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/documentation/sdk/en/BPMonlineWebSDK/Screenshots/Button/8.2/scr_primary_color.png)  
accent|  ![](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/documentation/sdk/en/BPMonlineWebSDK/Screenshots/Button/8.2/scr_accent_color.png)  
warn|  ![](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/documentation/sdk/en/BPMonlineWebSDK/Screenshots/Button/8.2/scr_warn_color.png)  
outline|  ![](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/documentation/sdk/en/BPMonlineWebSDK/Screenshots/Button/8.2/scr_outline_color.png)  
displayType: ButtonDisplayType  
Button display type. By default, `contained`.
Available values
contained|  ![](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/documentation/sdk/en/BPMonlineWebSDK/Screenshots/Button/8.2/scr_warn_color.png)  
---|---  
text|  ![](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/documentation/sdk/en/BPMonlineWebSDK/Screenshots/Button/8.2/scr_text_displayType.png)  
ariaLabel: string  
Button property mapped to the `aria-label` button attribute. Uses the `caption` property value by default.
caption: string  
Localizable button caption.
disabled: boolean  
Flag that locks the button. By default, `false`.
Available values
false| The button is unlocked.  
---|---  
true| The button is locked.  
pressed: boolean  
Flag that displays the button clicked status. By default, `false`.
Available values
false|  ![](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/documentation/sdk/en/BPMonlineWebSDK/Screenshots/Button/8.2/scr_accent_color.png)| The button is not clicked.  
---|---|---  
true|  ![](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/documentation/sdk/en/BPMonlineWebSDK/Screenshots/Button/8.2/scr_true_pressed.png)| The button is clicked.  
disableRipple: boolean  
Property that disables the button animation on click. By default, `false` (animation enabled).
textTransform: TextTransform  
Display the style of the button caption.
Available values
capitalize|  ![](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/documentation/sdk/en/BPMonlineWebSDK/Screenshots/Button/8.2/scr_accent_color.png)| Capitalize the first letter of every word in the caption.  
---|---|---  
lowercase|  ![](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/documentation/sdk/en/BPMonlineWebSDK/Screenshots/Button/8.2/scr_lowercase_textTransform.png)| Do not capitalize the first letter of every word in the caption.  
uppercase|  ![](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/documentation/sdk/en/BPMonlineWebSDK/Screenshots/Button/8.2/scr_uppercase_textTransform.png)| Capitalize every letter of the caption.  
none|  ![](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/documentation/sdk/en/BPMonlineWebSDK/Screenshots/Button/8.2/scr_accent_color.png)| Do not convert the caption.  
inherit|  ![](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/documentation/sdk/en/BPMonlineWebSDK/Screenshots/Button/8.2/scr_accent_color.png)| Inherit the styles of the parent element.  
clickMode: ButtonClickMode  
Sets the button mode. By default, `default`.
Available values
default|  ![](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/documentation/sdk/en/BPMonlineWebSDK/Screenshots/Button/8.2/scr_default_clickMode.png)  
---|---  
menu|  ![](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/documentation/sdk/en/BPMonlineWebSDK/Screenshots/Button/8.2/scr_menu_clickMode.png)  
size: SizeEnum  
Sets the button size. By default, `large`.
Available values
none|  ![](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/documentation/sdk/en/BPMonlineWebSDK/Screenshots/Button/8.2/scr_none_size.png)  
---|---  
default|  ![](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/documentation/sdk/en/BPMonlineWebSDK/Screenshots/Button/8.2/scr_accent_color.png)  
extra-small|  ![](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/documentation/sdk/en/BPMonlineWebSDK/Screenshots/Button/8.2/scr_extra_small_size.png)  
small|  ![](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/documentation/sdk/en/BPMonlineWebSDK/Screenshots/Button/8.2/scr_small_size.png)  
medium|  ![](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/documentation/sdk/en/BPMonlineWebSDK/Screenshots/Button/8.2/scr_medium_size.png)  
large|  ![](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/documentation/sdk/en/BPMonlineWebSDK/Screenshots/Button/8.2/scr_accent_color.png)  
extra-large|  ![](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/documentation/sdk/en/BPMonlineWebSDK/Screenshots/Button/8.2/scr_extra_large_size.png)  
shape: BaseComponentShape  
Sets the button shape. By default, `default`.
Available values
default|  ![](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/documentation/sdk/en/BPMonlineWebSDK/Screenshots/Button/8.2/scr_accent_color.png)  
---|---  
rounded|  ![](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/documentation/sdk/en/BPMonlineWebSDK/Screenshots/Button/8.2/scr_rounded_shape.png)  
## Events​
clicked: boolean  
Fires when a user clicks the button.
## Styles​
disabled-button-background  
Color of an inactive button.
button-border-radius  
Button border radius.
iconSize: SizeEnum  
Sets the icon button size. By default, `large`.
Available values
none|  ![](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/documentation/sdk/en/BPMonlineWebSDK/Screenshots/Button/8.2/scr_none_iconSize.png)  
---|---  
default|  ![](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/documentation/sdk/en/BPMonlineWebSDK/Screenshots/Button/8.2/scr_none_iconSize.png)  
extra-small|  ![](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/documentation/sdk/en/BPMonlineWebSDK/Screenshots/Button/8.2/scr_none_iconSize.png)  
small|  ![](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/documentation/sdk/en/BPMonlineWebSDK/Screenshots/Button/8.2/scr_small_iconSize.png)  
medium|  ![](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/documentation/sdk/en/BPMonlineWebSDK/Screenshots/Button/8.2/scr_medium_iconSize.png)  
large|  ![](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/documentation/sdk/en/BPMonlineWebSDK/Screenshots/Button/8.2/scr_none_iconSize.png)  
extra-large|  ![](https://d3a7ykdi65m4cy.cloudfront.net/ac-en/s3fs-public/documentation/sdk/en/BPMonlineWebSDK/Screenshots/Button/8.2/scr_extra_large_iconSize.png)  
## Icon button​
**Icon button** is an additional setting of a **Button** type component.
### Properties​
iconPosition: IconPositionEnum  
Position of the icon relative to the button caption. By default, `only-text`.
Available values
only-text|  ![](https://academy.creatio.com/sites/default/files/documentation/sdk/ru/BPMonlineWebSDK/Screenshots/ComponentButton/8.0/scr_only_text_button.png)  
---|---  
left-icon|  ![](https://academy.creatio.com/sites/default/files/documentation/sdk/ru/BPMonlineWebSDK/Screenshots/ComponentButton/8.0/scr_left_icon_button.png)  
right-icon|  ![](https://academy.creatio.com/sites/default/files/documentation/sdk/ru/BPMonlineWebSDK/Screenshots/ComponentButton/8.0/scr_right_icon_button.png)  
only-icon|  ![](https://academy.creatio.com/sites/default/files/documentation/sdk/ru/BPMonlineWebSDK/Screenshots/ComponentButton/8.0/scr_only_icon_button.png)  
caption: string  
Localizable schema caption displayed when holding the pointer over the button.
icon: string  
Icon to display next to the button caption.
Available values

---|---

## Menu-item component​
`Menu-item` is a component that lets you add additional actions to a button menu item. Use the `Menu-item` component for any interaction that performs an action on the current page.
### Properties​
caption: string  
Localizable caption of the button menu item.
visible: boolean  
Flag that manages the menu item visibility.
disabled: boolean  
Flag that locks the menu item. By default, `false`.
items: CrtMenuItemViewElementConfig[]  
Index of button menu items. Displayed when you hold the pointer over the menu item that contains a submenu. The operation mechanism and properties of the button submenu and the button itself are identical.
icon: string  
Icon to display next to the menu item caption.

code_examples.context: Button name. Required to bind the button to a handler, access the model attributes, etc.
Button property mapped to thearia-labelbutton attribute. Uses thecaptionproperty value by default.
Property that disables the button animation on click. By default,false(animation enabled).
Inherit the styles of the parent element.
Localizable schema caption displayed when holding the pointer over the button.
Flag that locks the menu item. By default,false.
